setting.name: web_language
setting.label: web_language
setting.description: The language for the web interface.

setting.name: language
setting.label: language
setting.description: The language for the display of the phone.

setting.name: display_method
setting.label: display_method
setting.description: The style how numbers are displayed to the user.

setting.name: tone_scheme
setting.label: tone_scheme
setting.description: The tone scheme for audible feedback.

setting.name: mwi_notification
setting.label: mwi_notification
setting.description: Message Waiting Indication Notification

setting.name: mwi_dialtone
setting.label: mwi_dialtone
setting.description: Message Waiting Indiccation Dial Tone

setting.name: headset_device
setting.label: headset_device
setting.description: Use Headset Device

setting.name: use_backlight
setting.label: use_backlight
setting.description: Use Backlight.

setting.name: date_us_format
setting.label: date_us_format
setting.description: US date format (mm/dd).

setting.name: time_24_format
setting.label: time_24_format
setting.description: 24 hour clock.

setting.name: with_flash
setting.label: with_flash
setting.description: Use Flash Plugin.

setting.name: redirect_event
setting.label: redirect_event
setting.description: Redirect when.

setting.name: redirect_number
setting.label: redirect_number
setting.description: Destination Number or URI for redirection.

setting.name: redirect_busy_number
setting.label: redirect_busy_number
setting.description: Destination Number or URI for rediretion on busy.

setting.name: ringer_headset_device
setting.label: ringer_headset_device
setting.description: Ringer Device for Headset.

setting.name: ring_sound
setting.label: ring_sound
setting.description: Default Ringer.

setting.name: friends_ring_sound
setting.label: friends_ring_sound
setting.description: Ringer for Addressbook Category Friends.

setting.name: family_ring_sound
setting.label: family_ring_sound
setting.description: Ringer for Addressbook Category Family.

setting.name: colleagues_ring_sound
setting.label: colleagues_ring_sound
setting.description: Ringer for Addressbook Category Colleagues.

setting.name: vip_ring_sound
setting.label: vip_ring_sound
setting.description: Ringer for Addressbook Category VIP.

setting.name: custom_melody_url
setting.label: custom_melody_url
setting.description: HTTP URL to an WAV file for a Custom Melody.

setting.name: auto_connect_indication
setting.label: auto_connect_indication
setting.description: Auto Answer Indication.

setting.name: auto_connect_type
setting.label: auto_connect_type
setting.description: Auto Answering Type.

setting.name: privacy_in
setting.label: privacy_in
setting.description: Call Line Identification Presentation (CLIP)

setting.name: privacy_out
setting.label: privacy_out
setting.description: Call Line Identification Restriction (CLIR)

setting.name: challenge_response
setting.label: Challenge Response on phone
setting.description: Show password dialog for challenges

setting.name: cmc_feature
setting.label: CMC Feature
setting.description: Client Matter Code Feature

setting.name: callpickup_dialoginfo
setting.label: Dialog-Info Call Pickup
setting.description: Show possible Pickup Informations on the screen

setting.name: call_join_xfer
setting.label: Call join on XFER (2 calls)
setting.description: Join two calls directly when pressing the transfer key

setting.name: deny_all_feature
setting.label: Deny All Feature
setting.description: Show button for always dening call from that caller

setting.name: transfer_on_hangup
setting.label: Transfer on Onhook
setting.description: Join two calls when going onhook

setting.name: http_port
setting.label: HTTP Port
setting.description: Port of the phones HTTP server

setting.name: http_user
setting.label: HTTP User
setting.description: Username for the authentication at the webinterface of the phone

setting.name: http_pass
setting.label: HTTP Password
setting.description: Password for the authentication at the webinterface of the phone

setting.name: http_scheme
setting.label: Digest Authentication Scheme
setting.description: Digest or Basic HTTP Authentication Scheme

setting.name: https_port
setting.label: HTTPS Port
setting.description: Port of the phones HTTPS server

setting.name: sip_retry_t1
setting.label: SIP T1(ms)
setting.description: SIP retransmission timer value T1

setting.name: session_timer
setting.label: SIP Session Timer
setting.description: Default value for SIP session timer

setting.name: network_id_port
setting.label: Network Identity Port
setting.description: The local SIP port at the phone

setting.name: max_forwards
setting.label: SIP Max Forwards
setting.description: Default value for the SIP Max-Forwards header

setting.name: refer_brackets
setting.label: Refer-To Brackets
setting.description: Enclose the Refer-To header in brackets

setting.name: register_http_contact
setting.label: Register HTTP Contact
setting.description: Include HTTP Contacts in REGISTER requests

setting.name: filter_registrar
setting.label: Filter Packets from Registrar
setting.description: Accept incoming requests only from the proxies

setting.name: challenge_reboot
setting.label: Authentication for SIP Reboot
setting.description: Authentication required for NOTIFYs with event reboot

setting.name: challenge_checksync
setting.label: Authentication for SIP Check-Sync
setting.description: Authentication required for NOTIFYs with event check-sync. WARNING breaks provisioning with sipXconfig if turend on!

setting.name: aoc_amount_display
setting.label: AOC Amount Display
setting.description: Show AOC information if available

setting.name: aoc_cost_pulse
setting.label: AOC Cost/Pulse
setting.description: Cost per pulse

setting.name: dtmf_payload_type
setting.label: DTMF Payload Type
setting.description: Default dynamic payload type for DTMF events

setting.name: admin_mode
setting.label: Administrator Mode
setting.description: Several settings are only available for administrator

setting.name: admin_mode_password
setting.label: Administrator Password
setting.description: Password to change from user to admin mode

setting.name: syslog_server
setting.label: Syslog Server
setting.description: Address of the syslog server for remote logging

setting.name: intercom_enabled
setting.label: Intercom Enabled
setting.description: Allow incoming intercom calls

setting.name: setting_server
setting.label: Setting URL
setting.description: URL from where the phone loads its settings during startup

setting.name: firmware_status
setting.label: Firmware Status URL
setting.description: URL which will be checked regularly for a new firmware URL

setting.name: firmware_interval
setting.label: Firmware Interval
setting.description: After how many seconds the Firmware Status URL will be checked again

setting.name: firmware
setting.label: Firmware URL
setting.description: URL for downloading a new firmware

setting.name: update_policy
setting.label: Update Policy

option.label: Never update, do not load settings

setting.description: How should new settings and/or new firmware be handled

setting.name: license_url
setting.label: License URL
setting.description: URL where the license for the phone can be downloaded

setting.name: user_active
setting.label: Line active
setting.description: Active (registered) line or not.

setting.name: user_realname
setting.label: Displayname
setting.description: Caller ID value.

setting.name: user_name
setting.label: Account
setting.description: Number or name which is used for registration.

setting.name: user_host
setting.label: Registrar
setting.description: FQDN name of the domain or registrar.

setting.name: user_pname
setting.label: Authentication Username
setting.description: Username for the authentication if it differs from username.

setting.name: user_pass
setting.label: Password
setting.description: Password for authentication against the server.

setting.name: user_mailbox
setting.label: Mailbox
setting.description: Number to internal voice mail system.
